planners.Title: Planners
planners.Description: View and manage available planners for solving planning problems.

solvers.Title: Solvers
solvers.Description: Access available solvers to compute solutions for defined problems.

solve.Title: Solve
solve.Description: Submit a planning problem to be solved using selected planners and solvers.

validate.Title: Validate
validate.Description: Check the correctness and consistency of generated plans or solutions.

convert.Title: Convert
convert.Description: Convert between different formats, e.g., PDDL, Mermaid, or other supported representations.

chart.Title: Interactive Chart
chart.Description: Display interactive Gantt charts or timeline components to visualize planning steps and schedules.
